title: Specialised Doctors
problem_statement:
Specialised Doctors

You are given a table named doctors which maintains the details of some famous hospitals and doctors in the city.

Your task is to write an SQL query to fetch the doctor\'s name, specialty, and hospital names who work in the same hospital but in a different specialty. Arrange the final result in the descending order of the column specialty.

Input Format

The input is a table named doctors with the following fields:

Field Type Description
id INT Represents the unique ID of the doctor.
name VARCHAR Represents the name of the doctor.
specialty VARCHAR Represents the specialty of the doctor.
hospital VARCHAR Represents the name of the hospital where the doctor works.

Output Format

The output should be a table with the following columns:

  • name: The name of the doctor.
  • specialty: The specialty of the doctor.
  • hospital: The name of the hospital where the doctor works.

The result should be ordered in descending order by the specialty column.

Constraints

  • Time Limit: 5 seconds for each input file.
  • Memory Limit: 256 MB.
  • Source Limit: 1024 KB.

Examples

Input:
Table: doctors
id | name       | specialty   | hospital
1  | Dr. Stella | Homeopathy  | KMC Hospital
2  | Dr. Matthews | Dermatology | KMC Hospital
3  | Dr. Johnson | Cardiology | City Hospital
Output:
name       | specialty   | hospital
Dr. Stella | Homeopathy  | KMC Hospital
Dr. Matthews | Dermatology | KMC Hospital

Explanation:

Dr. Stella and Dr. Matthews work in the same hospital (KMC Hospital) but have different specialties. Therefore, they are included in the output.
